about_the_game:
Protect your character from the sun in style with this exclusive in-game sun hat inspired by the humanitarian mission of the International Rescue Committee (IRC).

The International Rescue Committee (IRC) helps people affected by humanitarian crises to survive, recover and rebuild their lives. They deliver lasting impact by providing health care, helping children learn, and empowering individualsand communities to become self-reliant, always with a focus on the unique needs of women and girls.

Note: This is a cosmetic item only and has no in-game effect.
